repo.description: The most widely used Python to C compiler
repo.name: cython

commit.message:
Implement PEP-487: simpler customisation of class creation.
Closes GH-2781.
Move a longer utility function away from the top of the C file.

Streamline PEP-487 implementation to avoid slowdowns if it's not used.
Also provide a PyPy fallback for the missing "PySuper_Type" in PyPy2.
Always make a copy of the type dict before iterating over it since iteration can alter it.
Safety fix in Py2 fallback code.
Give PEP-487 support a feature flag since it doesn't seem to work in PyPy2 (7.1.1, as available on travis).
Disable "test_subclassinit" test only in PyPy2, not in PyPy3.
Explicitly require a used utility function (and use it in one more place).

repo.description: The most widely used Python to C compiler
repo.name: cython

milestone.description:
Goals:
 New version scheme: 3.x instead of 0.x.
 Change default `language_level` from `2` to `3`.
 Change default for `binding` directive from `False` to `True`.
 Fix some Python compatibility issues (if possible, allowing for breaking changes).

title: Implement PEP-487: simpler customisation of class creation
